Package net.sourceforge.waters.model.marshaller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CopyingProxyUnmarshaller<D extends DocumentProxy>
    An unmarshalling interface to support importing of multiple documents from a single external source.
    ProxyMarshaller<D extends DocumentProxy>
    The basic marshaller interface.
    ProxyUnmarshaller<D extends DocumentProxy>
    The basic unmarshaller interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DocumentManager
    A helper class to access and store the contents of documents obtained from XML files.
    JAXBAbstractModuleImporter<D extends DocumentProxy,T extends NamedType>  
    JAXBCounterExampleMarshaller  
    JAXBDocumentImporter<D extends DocumentProxy,T extends NamedType>  
    JAXBMarshaller<D extends DocumentProxy,T extends NamedType>
    A helper class to read and write XML files.
    JAXBModuleExporter  
    JAXBModuleImporter  
    JAXBModuleMarshaller
    A helper class to read and write Waters Module (.wmod) files.
    JAXBProductDESMarshaller
    A helper class to read and write Waters Product DES (.wdes) files.
    MarshallingTools
    A collection of static methods to facilitate the reading and writing of Waters documents from and to files.
    ProductDESImporter
    A converter to translate the Product DES structure (ProductDESProxy) back into the Module (ModuleProxy) structure.
    ProductDESToModuleUnmarshaller
    A utility to load a product DES (.wdes) file as a module.
    StandardExtensionFileFilter
    A simple file filter for use with Swing's file chooser, to match file names with a single extension.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BadFileTypeException  
    WatersMarshalException
    An exception indicating that writing or exporting Waters data structures to a file has failed.
    WatersUnmarshalException
    An exception indicating that reading or importing Waters data structures from a file has failed.
